alert.note: Alert for Bingham (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 23 at 7:22PM MDT until May 23 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Idaho, including the following county, Bingham. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 720 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms causing urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Blackfoot, Rose, Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, Groveland and Wapello. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
